description: Performs a linear interpolation for each of the no-data values (`null`) in the array given, except for the first and last value. If one of those values is a no-data value, they can be replaced with the parameters `first` and `last`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
An array of numbers and no-data values.

If the given array is a labeled array, the labels must have a natural/inherent label order and it expects the labels to be sorted accordingly. This is the default behavior in openEO for spatial and temporal dimensions.

parameters.name: first
parameters.description: A value to set for the first value, if the first value is a no-data value. By default (`null`), the value is not changed.

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: A value to set for the last value, if the last value is a no-data value. By default (`null`), the value is not changed.

returns.description: An array with no-data values being replaced with either interpolated values or the values given in the parameters `first` and `last`.
